description: Though her madness knew no bounds, Queen Venus could be a valuable ally to those that somehow managed to gain her favor. Great Fairies under her power were known for their healing of wounded warriors that found their fountains.
requirementsTooltip: You must select Venus, Queen of the Mad, as your hero.
